title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4036 - Weighing In
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4036 - Weighing In

State Regulations
§ 4036.1 - Time, manner of weighing in
§ 4036.2 - No one to touch horse, equipment before weighing in
§ 4036.3 - Jockey penalized for misconduct
§ 4036.4 - Jockey penalized for excess weight

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4036

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1934, ch. 310, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
